attributes.action: Offer Intravenous Vitamin C for Coronavirus patients.
attributes.additional_details:
Based upon several recent case studies of IV Vitamin C and its beneficial effects for Coronavirus patients. Patients should be allowed to opt Vit C treatments.

"High-dose intravenous Vit C has also been successfully used in the treatment of moderate to severe COVID-19 patients in China. The doses used varied between 2 g and 10 g per day, given over a period of 8–10 h.The oxygenation index was improving in real time and all the patients eventually cured and were discharged." (Dr Richard Cheng).
attributes.background: For the Prime minister, politicians, and other health officials to immediately approve High Dose IV Vitamin C for Covid-19 treatment. To offer this to Patients and to improve advice about improving the immune system.
